Reviews
Start stop reviews carousel 
Review by - Google

Matthew A:
five star review by 
Big Money Maker with fries and beer was an excellent choice for dinner. Bartender was attentive, food was excellent, beer was cold and ambiance was laid back with plenty of screens to watch. Always my go to place when I'm in North Charleston.

Review by - Google

JR D:
five star review by 
Absolutely a sweet place to dine! Our waitress was friendly and informative. We had salad (huge) and wings. Wings were the real deal. Try something besides a chain!

Review by - Google

Crystal S:
five star review by 
Great spot! After 10, they close the grill and only have fried food. Wings are awesome!

Review by - Google

Ha D:
five star review by 
Good food, good price and good drink. Good place to hang out and watch sports. Staff are friendly.
